sections.content:
Question:
Is there a PMIC that can be used in combination with the RZ/A3UL?
Answer:
We provide a PMIC (DA9062) with a design optimized for the RZ/A3UL. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/power-power-management/multi-channel-power-management-ics-pmics/ssdsoc-power-management-ics-pmic-and-pmus/da9062-designed-applications-requiring-85
Suitable Products
RZ/A3UL
